snippet.title: War Robots: Frontiers - Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Welcome to War Robots: Frontiers, a new online multiplayer third-person shooter coming to PC and consoles!

Get ready to unleash your fleet of War Robots, engage in epic 6v6 team-based PvP battles, raze battlegrounds beyond the stars, explore a wealth of customization options, and smash through destructible environments. 

War Robots: Frontiers is an online mech shooter coming to PC, Xbox, and PS in 2025. Add to your Wishlist today!


Steam: https://wrfrontiers.com/l/steam
Xbox Series X|S, Xbox One: https://wrfrontiers.com/l/xbox
PlayStation®5, and PlayStation®4 : https://wrfrontiers.com/l/playstation  

Secure your PC Early Access to War Robots: Frontiers with a Pioneer Pack, now available from https://warrobotsfrontiers.com/packs

Stay connected with War Robots: Frontiers:
Official Newsletter : https://wrfrontiers.com/subscribe 
https://discord.com/invite/PDY5mZGrwD
https://www.facebook.com/wrfrontiers
https://www.twitter.com/WRFrontiers
https://www.instagram.com/wrfrontiers/
https://www.tiktok.com/@wrfrontiers
https://www.reddit.com/r/warrobotsfrontiers/
